Name: Hoarding Simulator
About the game: one of the best high-tech simulation ever created is here! you must collect some stuff for you, that's it, gotta collect 'em all. a third person style with one goal, collect everything! you are in a pacific town but a lot of crazy events can be the most terrible experience ever! Features: - real life physics, see the best physics ever made. - strategy mode with 20 levels. - controller support - day/night system - you can train in gym to be stronger and hold heavy stuff - totally caos when your friendship is low - more than 20 grabablle stuff
